namuth yami mina lagna himiyek ihatha sa`dahan wu guru uchicha wu kala simawa thuladi gurutama ayath wu dashawak gewanne nami pa්rathipala thawaduratath yahapath wana atha.esema ema mina lagna himiyagema guru upathin yahapath sthanayaka siti nami thawath yahapath bawak himi wanu atha.janmapatha්raya thula guru 1la2la4la5la7la9la10la11 wani sthanayaka guru sitimada guru yahapath yoga uda kara thibimada yahapath wanu atha.mema thathwayan yatathe guru maruewi sa`dahan wu siyaluma aakaraye shubhapala mema mina lagna himiya wethata himi wiya hakiyi.esema eki janmapath himiyage senasuruda upathin yahapath ayurinma sitiye nami ihatha ki senasuru apalaye ayahapath bawada tharamak thuni wi ya hakiyi.
